channel.title: Ethnic Minorities on DYREHAUGEN
channel.description: Recent content in Ethnic Minorities on DYREHAUGEN

item.title: The Lost Army
item.description: The Thai districts on the Myanmar border have very mixed ethnic groups and a rough history: The Shan are not the only ethnic group living here. Ban Mae Aeb is a small village comprising five ethnic groups living togetger. Besides the Shan, the village is home to Chinese, Lahu, Akha and Lua. The “Lost Army” - the republic of China’s 93rd Division - fled into Burma after their defeat to the communist.
